means: （使局部或全身失去知觉的）麻醉剂，麻醉药

word_mean: 麻醉药：用于消除痛觉的药物

sentence.Network_en: He was given a general anesthetic.
It would have to be done under anesthetic.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个只能在麻醉的情況下做。

sentence.Network_en: The addition of epinephrine to local anesthetic solutions produces vasoconstriction.
sentence.Network_cn: 局麻药溶液中加入肾上腺素,使血管收缩.
